content.rendered:
Creators Vince Shiao. Malcolm MacRury

Directed by T.J. Scott

Written by Vince Shiao. Malcolm MacRury. Alexandra Mircheff. Stephanie Tracey. Spencer Levine. John Krizanc. Ellen Vanstone. Nikolijne Troubetzkoy. Jackie May. Marsha Greene

Cast .Archie Panjabi. Christopher Plummer. Kris Holden-Ried. Florence Ordesh. Peter Mensah. Claire Forlani .Tamara Duarte. Mark Rendall. Allan Hawco. Tyler Fayose. Chloe Farnworth. Rebecca Liddiard.Kristian Bruun. Emilio Doorgasingh. Emmanuel Kabongo. Alexandre Bourgeois. Shazad Latif. Evan Buliung . Sasha Roiz. Chantelle Han. Ryan Pierce. Dougray Scott. Mark Lutz . Paris Jefferson

Language English

Producers D. Matt Geller. Jackie May. T.J. Scott. David A. Stern. Patrick Cassavetti. Christina Jennings. Chris Philip. Carlo Dusi. Karine Martin. Archie Panjabi. Rodrigo Herrera Ibarguengoytia. Scott Garvie. Jeremy Campbell. Tina Grewal. Diane Hendricks. Teresa M. Ho. John Krizanc. Julie Lacey. Malcolm MacRury. Chris Moreton. Vince Shiao. Ben Silverman. Bo Stehmeier. Jeff Stentz. Ellen Vanstone. Hannah Nailor. Laura Beetz. Paul Pope

Production Shaftesbury Films. Greenpoint Films. Starlings Television.

Music Director Keith Power

Season 3

Episodes 6
